name: Bloodclaw
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: This weapon – ow! Requires a little – OWW! Finesse.

name: Candleshot
text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavor: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.

name: Cursed Blade
text: Double all damage dealt to your hero.
flavor: The Curse is that you have to listen to "MMMBop" on repeat.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Kingsbane
text: [x]Always keeps enchantments. Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck.
flavor: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

name: Light's Justice
flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

name: Molten Blade
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
flavor: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

name: Serrated Tooth
text: Deathrattle: Give your minions Rush.
flavor: The tooth hurts, don’t it?

name: Sphere of Sapience
text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
look at your top card. You
can put it on the bottom
_and lose 1 Durability.
flavor: This is what it sounds like when spheres scry.

name: Trueaim Crescent
text: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.
flavor: You could have just pointed.

name: Argent Lance
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.
flavor: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

name: Bladed Gauntlet
text: Has Attack equal to your Armor. Can't attack heroes.
flavor: CAUTION: DO NOT SCRATCH NOSE.

name: Glaivezooka
text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavor: For the times when a regular bazooka just isn't enough.

name: Headhunter's Hatchet
text: [x]Battlecry: If you\ncontrol a Beast, gain\n+1 Durability.
flavor: Zul'jin's primary recruiting tool.

name: Jade Claws
text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.\nOverload: (1)@Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: "Best manicure ever!" - Aya Blackpaw

name: Likkim
text: Has +2 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: "I double frog dare you!"

name: Mysterious Blade
text: Battlecry: If you control a\nSecret, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: It knows every secret you have left.

name: Ritual Chopper
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Chop chop, Galakrond!

name: Rune Dagger
text: After your hero attacks, gain Spell Damage +1 this turn.
flavor: Turns out being stabbed makes you more vulnerable to magic.

name: Spirit Claws
text: [x]Has +2 Attack while you\nhave Spell Damage.
flavor: They'll be MUCH easier to use once they add the spiritthumb.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Stormforged Axe
text: Overload: (1)
flavor: Yo, that's a nice axe.

name: Umberwing
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Felwings.
flavor: Demon Hunters refer to these glaives as "the ol’ flappy-attackys."

name: Woodcutter's Axe
text: Deathrattle: Give +2/+1 to a random friendly Rush minion.
flavor: It's a lumberjack's axe and that's ok.

name: Aldrachi Warblades
text: Lifesteal
flavor: The ancient Aldrachi were the greatest warriors in the universe. Imagine their power if they'd put the handle at the END of the blade.

name: Ancharrr
text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate from your_deck.
flavor: The problem with anchors is they often end up sinking to the bottom of your deck.

name: Bulwark of Azzinoth
text: [x]Whenever your hero would\ntake damage, this loses\n_1 Durability instead.
flavor: This plate turned shield you shall wield, praying its powers fel will serve you well.

name: Ceremonial Maul
text: Spellburst: Summon a Student with Taunt and stats equal to the spell's Cost.
flavor: For the most discerning of hall monitors.

name: Coghammer
text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield and Taunt.
flavor: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

name: Cogmaster's Wrench
text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
flavor: For tightening cogs and smashin' troggs!

name: Desert Spear
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
flavor: Goes on the right, next to the desert spoon.

name: Dragon Soul
text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
flavor: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

name: Eaglehorn Bow
text: [x]Whenever a friendly\nSecret is revealed,\ngain +1 Durability.
flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Hooked Scimitar
text: [x]Combo: Gain +2 Attack.
flavor: Oooooooooooow. I'm hooked on a scimitar!

name: Ice Breaker
text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by_this.
flavor: A great way to end a conversation.

name: King's Defender
text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?

name: Livewire Lance
text: After your Hero attacks, add a Lackey to your_hand.
flavor: The lance is heavy but it’s the battery pack that really does a number on the shoulders.

name: Necrium Blade
text: Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion.
flavor: Grab death by the handle.

name: Ogre Warmaul
text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

name: Overlord's Whip
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
flavor: "This merit badge is for cruelty. This one's for whipping. And this one is for embroidery..."

name: Perdition's Blade
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Combo: Deal 2 instead.
flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

name: Powermace
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Mech +2/+2.
flavor: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

name: Rallying Blade
text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
flavor: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

name: Self-Sharpening Sword
text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: You no longer have to bring a stack of #2 swords to a test!

name: Shadowblade
text: Battlecry: Your hero is Immune this turn.
flavor: It's tacky to call it "Shadeblade."

name: Stormhammer
text: Doesn't lose Durability while you control a_Dragon.
flavor: It brings the storm before the calm.

name: Sword of Justice
text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1_Durability.
flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

name: Underlight Angling Rod
text: After your Hero attacks, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavor: "I said I wanted the ASHbringer not FISHbringer!"

name: Unidentified Maul
text: Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

name: Blood Razor
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nDeal 1 damage to all_minions.
flavor: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

name: Brass Knuckles
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\ngive a random minion in\nyour hand +1/+1.
flavor: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

name: Charged Hammer
text: Deathrattle: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

name: Death's Bite
text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord
howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Light's Sorrow
text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: These sorrows cut deep.

name: Marrowslicer
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor: Perfect for killing the first boss in Icecrown Citadel.

name: Obsidian Shard
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each\ncard you've played from\nanother class.
flavor: You know you’re a Rogue when a sharp rock makes you go “Ooh!  Dagger!”

name: Poisoned Blade
text: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

name: Reaper's Scythe
text: [x]Spellburst: Also\ndamages adjacent\nminions this turn.
flavor: Die. Die. Die.

name: Spectral Cutlass
text: [x]Lifesteal Whenever you play a card from another class, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: So sharp it can cut through a spectral tomato!

name: Splitting Axe
text: Battlecry: Summon copies of your Totems.
flavor: The ancient shaman chant, "Control Axe, Control Vee."

name: The Fist of Ra-den
text: [x]After you cast a spell, summon a Legendary minion of that Cost. Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: The mighty Ra-den was known as the Keeper of Storms. Unfortunately, he could not keep his fist.

name: Truesilver Champion
text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore #2_Health to it.
flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Twig of the World Tree
text: Deathrattle: Gain 10 Mana Crystals.
flavor: For druids who want to branch out.

name: Waggle Pick
text: [x]Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Kobolds informally refer to its effect as a deathwaggle.

name: Wrenchcalibur
text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a Bomb into your [x]opponent's deck.
flavor: Whoso pulleth out this wrench from the toolbox is rightwise king of the lab.

name: Arcanite Reaper
flavor: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

name: Assassin's Blade
flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

name: Boggspine Knuckles
text: After your hero attacks, transform your minions into random ones that cost (1) more.
flavor: I would NOT want to put my hand in there. It's... SQUISHY.

name: Doomhammer
text: Windfury, Overload: (2)
flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

name: Farraki Battleaxe
text: Overkill: Give a minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Only two things in life are certain: death and axes.

name: Fool's Bane
text: Unlimited attacks each turn. Can't attack heroes.
flavor: A fool and his bane are soon parted.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Hammer of Twilight
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Elemental.
flavor: Stop! It's Twilight Hammer time.

name: Piranha Launcher
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nsummon a 1/1 Piranha.
flavor: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

name: Skull of the Man'ari
text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
flavor: Don't trust the skull.

name: Supercollider
text: [x]After you attack a minion,\nforce it to attack one\nof its neighbors.
flavor: Boom's Second Law of Motion:\nHIT IT VERY HARD!

name: Tentacles for Arms
text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.
flavor: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

name: Aluneth
text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
flavor: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

name: Sul'thraze
text: Overkill: You may attack again.
flavor: “Griftah here with de Sul’chop. One chop, you get four damage. Two chops, eight damage - you gonna change de way you fight."

name: Val'anyr
text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
flavor: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

name: Warglaives of Azzinoth
text: After attacking a minion, your hero may attack again.
flavor: The blades glow green from things unseen, dark dreams whirling in the felfire gleam.

name: Flamereaper
text: Also damages the minions next to whomever your hero_attacks.
flavor: Honestly it sows more flame than it reaps.

name: Gladiator's Longbow
text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

name: Gorehowl
text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

name: Rhok'delar
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your_hand with Hunter_spells.
flavor: Rhok'delar is ready to Rhok'de'casbah!

name: Vinecleaver
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nsummon two 1/1 Silver\nHand Recruits.
flavor: George and Karl!  Thank the Light we found you!

name: Silver Sword
text: After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Silver’s malleability limits its utility as an edged weapon. On the other hand... SHINY!

name: The Runespear
text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell\nand cast it with random targets.
flavor: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

name: Woecleaver
text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
flavor: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!
